title: Proposals and Suggestions
content: I suggest that he [study|studies] harder. It is essential that she [be|is] on time.
explanationEnUs: The Subjunctive Mood uses the base form of the verb (study, be) in "that" clauses following verbs of suggestion or necessity.
explanationZhTw: 虛擬語氣在建議或必要性動詞後的 'that' 子句中使用動詞原形 (study, be)。
explanationZhCn: 虚拟语气在建议 or 必要性动词后的 'that' 子句中使用动词原形 (study, be)。

title: Wishes and Hypotheticals
content: I wish I [were|was] taller. If he [were|was] here, he would know what to do.
explanationEnUs: Use 'were' instead of 'was' for 'I', 'he', 'she', 'it' in wishes and contrary-to-fact conditions.
explanationZhTw: 在願望和與事實相反的條件句中，'I', 'he', 'she', 'it' 使用 'were' 而不是 'was'。
explanationZhCn: 在愿望和与事实相反的条件句中，'I', 'he', 'she', 'it' 使用 'were' 而不是 'was'。

title: Formal Requests
content: The boss requested that the meeting [be|is] postponed. It is important that everyone [attend|attends].
explanationEnUs: Verbs like 'request', 'demand', 'insist' are followed by the subjunctive (base form).
explanationZhTw: 像 'request', 'demand', 'insist' 這樣的動詞後面接虛擬語氣（原形）。
explanationZhCn: 像 'request', 'demand', 'insist' 这样的动词后面接虚拟语气（原形）。

title: Fixed Expressions
content: God [save|saves] the Queen! [Come|Comes] what may, I will support you.
explanationEnUs: The Subjunctive is preserved in certain fixed expressions.
explanationZhTw: 虛擬語氣保留在某些固定表達中。
explanationZhCn: 虚拟语气保留在某些固定表达中。

title: Negative Subjunctive
content: I recommended that she [not go|didn't go] alone. It is vital that we [not be|aren't] late.
explanationEnUs: Form the negative subjunctive with 'not' + base verb, do not use 'do/does/did'.
explanationZhTw: 虛擬語氣的否定形式是 'not' + 動詞原形，不使用 'do/does/did'。
explanationZhCn: 虚拟语气的否定形式是 'not' + 动词原形，不使用 'do/does/did'。
